short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best performing Bitefight Bot ever created. The only Original version that will receive functionality and performance updates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Created especially for professional Bitefight players, it helps you complete Bitefight Game actions in the most efficient way.

This extension is part of a series of 3 extensions: Silver, Gold and Master Auto Adventure where the Master version is the most complete and the best performing extension ever created for the Bitefight game. It changes the whole game experience ;)

If you want to level up as quickly as possible and do the actions in the game as quickly and efficiently as possible, then Bitefight Master Auto Adventure is the solution.

Functionalities of the extension:

‚≠êÔ∏èUNLIMITED NUMBER OF VAMPIRES/WEREWOLFS (FOR ONE LOBBY ACCOUNT)‚≠êÔ∏è

‚≠êÔ∏èSTORY‚≠êÔ∏è
*Complete the story in the most efficient way
*Prioritization of decisions (Whitelist and Blacklist)
*Default lists for decisions based on objectives (Gold, Aspects, Health or Experience)
*Stay alive with health protection (based on percentage)
*Stay alive with health protection (based on fixed value)
*100% healing at the church
*Choose decision "42" (for  drop) with minimal health risk

NEW: 
üöÄNow the extension comes pre-trained with 500,000/500,000 story decisions made. So that even from lvl 1 the bot is already trained and can choose the best decisions.
üöÄNewly created accounts have preset in Whitelist and Blacklist the best decisions for GOLD + EXP according to the tests we performed.

‚≠êÔ∏èGROTTO‚≠êÔ∏è
*Target (set fixed number of demon hunts)
*Continuous attack(UNLIMITED)
*Grotto stay alive mode 1(use APs to heal health at the church)
*Grotto stay alive mode 2(change difficulty when health starts to decrease)

‚≠êÔ∏èMAN HUNT‚≠êÔ∏è
*Target (set fixed number of man hunts)
*Continuous attack(UNLIMITED)

‚≠êÔ∏èHOUSE OF PAIN‚≠êÔ∏è
*Continuous attack
*Continuous attack with breaks at random intervals between attacks (undetectable by GO or SGO)
*Preview current items

‚≠êÔ∏èPVP‚≠êÔ∏è
*PVP Target (attack all, stronger or players from blacklist)
*Players Whitelist & Blacklist
*Continuous attack
*Continuous attack with breaks at random intervals between attacks (undetectable by GO or SGO)
*Preview current items	

‚≠êÔ∏èEQUIPMENT‚≠êÔ∏è
*Equipment Panel (See all items in one panel)	
*Change all items with just one click	
*Save your equipment sets (for Story, PVP, War...)	

‚≠êÔ∏èGIFT‚≠êÔ∏è
*Automatic opening of purple gifts	
*Gold target (open until you have enough gold for the item)
*Gifts number target (open only as many boxes as you want)
*Automatically uses gold from gifts for skill
*Automatic opening of dark blue gifts	
*Function that maximizes the time spent in the grotto so that you grow as much as possible during the Christmas/New Year events	

‚≠êÔ∏èPOTIONS AND PREMIUM POTIONS‚≠êÔ∏è
*Use automatically Energy Potion, Soup Of Life, Medium Healing Potion & Blood Potion
*Automatically buy potions when it runs out	
*Automatically sell or use potions dropped in story mode(individually, for each type of potion)
*Use automatically Energy Elixir
*Use automatically 100% Healing Potion
*Automatically buy premium potions when it runs out
*Potion logs panel

‚≠êÔ∏èSPEND GOLD‚≠êÔ∏è
*Automatically spend gold for skill
*Automatically donate gold to the clan

‚≠êÔ∏èWALLET TOOLS & PROTECTION‚≠êÔ∏è
*Gold buffer (keeps part of the gold in the inventory)
*Gold protection (the bot stops when the amount is reached)

‚≠êÔ∏èSCHEDULE‚≠êÔ∏è
Set it to run only during certain hours, so everything will be much more natural and undetectable

‚≠êÔ∏èORBS‚≠êÔ∏è
*See active orbs, grouped by item class, in a minimalist panel along with their bonuses and how much they have until they expire
*Create new orbs directly from the panel (double click for two orbs or triple click for 3 orbs)
*Widget with active orbs

‚≠êÔ∏èSHORTCUTS AND WIDGETS‚≠êÔ∏è
*Panel with game shortcuts	
*Widget with game shortcuts	
*Shortcut for gold donation (Clan page)	
*Searchbar for missions(Tavern page)
*Searchbar for items(Merchant page)
*Only show my items(Merchant page)

‚≠êÔ∏èOTHERS‚≠êÔ∏è
*Activity log
*Automatic enrollment in the war between clans
*Smarter area for orbs
*Fixed infobar when scrolling
*Panel for notes with an unlimited number of characters (saved locally)
*Click on Easter Eggs when bot find it and log panel where the rewards are recorded
*Story rewards log (record the rewards for decisions 30 and 42 separately)

‚≠êÔ∏èIMPORT/EXPORT SETTINGS‚≠êÔ∏è
*Migrate to another browser or device without losing your settings.
*You can also move settings from one account to another with just a few clicks.

Other updates will follow!üöÄ

See more here: https://bitefight-bot.pages.dev/

19.99EUR Monthly subscription*
Secure recurring payment with Stripe!

*the license is paid for an email address and must be the same as the one used for the Bitefight Lobby. If you pay for another email address, this bot will not work!

LIMITED: Now if you have more than one lobby account, after paying the license you can write to me at the email address masterofbitefight@gmail.com and I can add you a secondary address so that you can use the license on both lobby accounts.

This is not like Classic Auto Adventure, this is Pro software for Pro players.
Give up the old bot and make now a major upgrade to Master Auto Adventure!
